attributes.action: Prevent all people who were "Bullied At School" from becoming Traffic Wardens.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Prevent all people who were "Bullied At School" from becoming Traffic Wardens. Thus preventing the possibility of these persons exacting revenge on society. This would also reduce the numbers of Traffic Wardens by around 95%.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
